title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: June 19, 2023, 01:37:17 AMLast edit: October 31, 2023, 01:03:05 AM by julerz12
content: [UPDATE]6/23/23 SOIL Team promises to escrow the bounty pool funds after the Token Generation Event (TGE) roughly around on WEEK 2 campaign date.[UPDATE]7/16/23 SOIL's bounty campaign will be extended for an additional 2 weeks.The team decided to extend it to help with promoting their upcoming private sale. No additional bounty pool.[UPDATE]7/31/23 SOIL's bounty campaign has officially ended. The spreadsheet will be finalized and all stakes will be tallied by the bounty campaign manager. The Final List will be sent to the Soil team after 1 or 2 weeks and they will facilitate the bounty rewards distribution themselves. No official date yet as to when they plan on doing that.Signatures can now be removed/changed.[UPDATE]8/9/23 SOIL's bounty campaign FINAL LIST has been forwarded to the SOIL Team. The SOIL Team will facilitate the bounty rewards distribution themselves. No official date yet as to when they plan on doing that.[UPDATE]10/12/23 SOIL team states that the bounty rewards will be distributed 2-weeks after the $SOIL token is listed. No official date when.Read here: https://t.me/soilfarm/38957[UPDATE]10/31/23  Bounty rewards have been distributed. Instead of $SOIL token, it was converted to USDT.Read here: https://t.me/soilfarm/42966AvatarsDownloadDownloadPersonal TextCode:Soil.co - Earn USDT/USDCSignaturesHero/Legendary Rank Signature
